channel.title: Toubkal 2024 on Martin's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Toubkal 2024 on Martin's Blog

item.title: Getting ready for the trip to Morocco
item.description: Atlas mountains (Shutterstock) This is a trip I have been thinking about for a while. But I didn’t just want to drive to an airport and fly to Morocco. I wanted to use my favourite transport mode - my beloved motorcycle. And the KTM Super Adventure is well up for the task. I have only made a very approximate plan of my route but it would basically look something like this: ride to Folkestone, Channel Tunnel to Calais, then ride through France but not planning to stop much.
